des: "Our fig tree gives us more fruit than we can eat. I discovered this unique recipe by adding fig to every dish I ate. Who knew pasta and fig would go perfectly together? Add crumbled feta cheese to give it a creamier flavor."
ins: Bring 2 cups water to a boil in a saucepan. Add ramen noodles; cook and stir until just softened, about 3 minutes. Drain noodles in a colander; toss with figs.
